alert.note: Alert for Pratt; Stafford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 6:19AM CDT until June 21 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Stafford County in south central Kansas... Pratt County in south central Kansas... * Until 700 AM CDT. * At 619 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located very near Byers, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Iuka around 630 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Cullison, Pratt, Sawyer and Coats. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
